modName: Black Dark Brotherhood Robe - Two versions black and blacker
summary: replaces the DB robe with my version of the black robe
descriptionHtml:
Be honest, if someone comes to kill you looking like [URL=http://image.toutlecine.com/photos/r/o/m/roman-d-elvis-tv-1979-03-g.jpg]THIS[/URL]


wouldn\'t you die laughing?

Now this is over! You don\'t have to look like Elvis (or who know who) with this ridiculous costume! This mod replaces the DB robe and hood with the texture of the black warlock robe/hood (the ones I made for [URL= http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2761]this mod[/URL])

The side effect of this retex is that you can actually wear the hood from the warlock robe with anything (not only with the robe)

WARNING: 
1) Obviously if you don\'t like my retex you won\'t like this replacement...
2) I don\'t think this works for argonian or khajits
3) I\'m sure it doesn\'t work for females. If anyone really wants it, MP me and i\'ll try to do something

EDIT: I added a \"less Black\" version with a little sharpening, because straticaster50 noted that the \"full black\" was actually too much black. So if you\'re not happy now I can\'t do more i\'m sorry
author: KoRevas
